divs: Sighting Detailswe are on the farm watching the bricklayers do an reforme in the house,take some photos and saw nothing in sky . When we arived at home we saw the ufo and think it was a plane. today I was looking at the photos from my computer and saw that the picture that was not a plane, but a UFO was there I become realy affright I called my brother to see why the rest of my family was asleep. and then decided to send the picture for you what teenagers have to earn creating these stories i dont know about me ; name :mauro age: 13 ocupation: studant grade:7��� grade the story is good advice send an email if it is ridiculous but also send an email saying that are ridiculous note that in the photo, around the UFO has a bright blue
Summary: Appearance in my dad's farm reform.
